artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black pigment on cream paper; thick black line forms tree trunk vertically in center of image; black branches in many directions with black pointed leaf shapes throughout most of image; at bottom of image alternating vertical stripe pattern with rubbing-like textured appearance below leaves; rough edges on paper
